---
title: "ProStaR analysis report"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_document: default
always_allow_html: yes
---


# Versions

```{r DT_versions,out.width = "50%", echo=FALSE}
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
df <- getPackagesVersions('installed')
kable(as.data.frame(df[-3,]),escape = F)%>% row_spec(0,bold=TRUE, background='#fff8ff') %>% 
kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c( "bordered","striped"), full_width = F)
detach("package:kableExtra", unload=TRUE)

```



# Summary 


```{r DT_summary,out.width = "50%", echo=FALSE}
require(knitr)
require(kableExtra)
df <- BuildParamDT()

if (!is.null(df)){
  kable(as.data.frame(df),escape = F)%>% row_spec(0,bold=TRUE,background = '#ffff0f') %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c( "bordered","striped"), full_width = F)
}
detach("package:kableExtra", unload=TRUE)

```
